text.div:
This case-insensitive code system http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart-hiv/CodeSystem/HIV.G defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
DE1 CD4 countCD4 cell count in cells/mm^3
DE2 CD4 cell percentageCD4 cell percentage
DE3 Baseline CD4 countCD4 result from first CD4 test performed (such as at treatment initiation), also may be called CD4 at ART initiation or at ART start
DE4 Date of baseline CD4 count sample collectionDate and time when baseline CD4 count test sample was collected
DE5 Late ART initiationThe client's first CD4 count from baseline CD4 test performed (such as at treatment initiation) was a count of <200 cells/mm3
DE6 Date of CD4 sample collectionDate sample to be used for CD4 count was collected
DE7 Viral load test conductedA viral load test was performed
DE8 Date of viral load sample collectionDate and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load
DE9 Date of first viral load sample collectionDate and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load for the first time
DE10 Date viral load sample sentDate viral load sample sent to the lab
DE11 First viral load test resultResult from the initial viral load test in number of copies/mL
DE12 Viral load test resultResult from the viral load test in number of copies/mL
DE13 HIV viral load specimen typeThe type of specimen to be used to test viral load
DE14 Liquid plasma specimen for viral load testingLiquid plasma and using ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) or plasma preparation tubes for viral load test
DE15 Dried blood spot specimenDried blood spot specimen (DBS) for viral load test
DE16 Dried plasma spot from a plasma separation cardDried plasma spot from a plasma separation card for viral load test
DE17 HBsAg test dateDate client was tested for hepatitis B virus (HBV)
DE18 HBsAg test resultHepatitis B virus test result (HBsAg)
DE19 PositiveHBsAg test result was positive
DE20 NegativeHBsAg test result was negative
DE21 IndeterminateHBsAg test result was indeterminate
DE22 Reason Hepatitis B test not conductedReason why a hepatitis B test was not done
DE23 Test delayed to next contact or referredTest has been delayed to the next contact or client was referred to another provider/facility
DE24 Stock-out or expiredTest out of stock or stock present but expired
DE25 Machine or technician not available or machine not functioningTest machine or technician is unavailable, or machine is not functioning
DE26 Client declined / refused testClient declined or refused test being undertaken
DE27 OtherOther reason test not performed
DE28 Other (specify)Other reason test not performed (specify)
DE29 Hepatitis B diagnosisClient's hepatitis B diagnosis
DE30 Hepatitis B positiveClient is positive for Hepatitis B
DE31 Hepatitis B negativeClient is negative for Hepatitis B
DE32 Hepatitis C screening dateDate when client was screened for HCV
DE33 Hepatitis C test orderedHepatitis C test has been ordered
DE34 Hepatitis C test conductedWhether a hepatitis C test was conducted
DE35 Reason Hepatitis C test not doneReason why a hepatitis C test was not done
DE36 Test delayed to next contact or referredTest has been delayed to the next contact or client was referred to another provider/facility
DE37 Stock-out or expiredTest out of stock or stock present but expired
DE38 Machine or technician not available or machine not functioningTest machine or technician is unavailable, or machine is not functioning
DE39 Client declined / refused testClient declined or refused test being undertaken
DE40 OtherOther reason test not performed
DE41 Other (specify)Other reason test not performed (specify)
DE42 HCV test dateDate client was tested for hepatitis C virus (HCV antibody, HCV RNA or HCV core antigen)
DE43 HCV test resultHepatitis C virus test result (HCV antibody, HCV RNA or HCV core antigen)
DE44 PositiveHCV test result was positive
DE45 NegativeHCV test result was negative
DE46 IndeterminateHCV test result was indeterminate
DE47 HCV viral load test dateHepatitis C viral load test date
DE48 HCV viral load test resultHepatitis C viral load test result (qualitative)
DE49 DetectedHCV was detected
DE50 Not detectedHCV was not detected
DE51 Hepatitis C diagnosisClient's hepatitis C diagnosis
DE52 Hepatitis C positiveClient is positive for hepatitis C
DE53 Hepatitis C negativeClient is negative for hepatitis C
DE54 Syphilis test requiredSyphilis test is required
DE55 Syphilis test typeType of diagnostic test used for syphilis (treponema pallidum)
DE56 TreponemalTreponemal test used
DE57 Non-treponemalNon-treponemal test used
DE58 POC TestPoint-of-care (POC) test used
DE59 NAATNucleic Acid Amplification Test (NAAT) used
DE60 OtherOther test used
DE61 Other syphilis test type (specify)Other test used (specify)
DE62 Reason syphilis test not doneReason why a syphilis test was not done
DE63 Test delayed to next contact or referredTest has been delayed to the next contact or client was referred to another provider/facility
DE64 Stock-out or expiredTest out of stock or stock present but expired
DE65 Machine or technician not available or machine not functioningTest machine or technician is unavailable, or machine is not functioning
DE66 Client declined / refused testClient declined or refused test being undertaken
DE67 OtherOther reason test not performed
DE68 Other (specify)Other reason test not performed (specify)
DE69 Syphilis test dateDate of syphilis test
DE70 Syphilis test resultResult from syphilis test
DE71 PositiveTest result is positive for syphilis
DE72 NegativeTest result is negative for syphilis
DE73 InconclusiveTest result is inconclusive
DE74 Syphilis diagnosisClient's syphilis diagnosis
DE75 Syphilis positiveClient is positive for syphilis
DE76 Syphilis negativeClient is negative for syphilis
DE77 Other tests conductedIf the health worker performed other tests on the woman that are not explicitly listed in the application, select "yes" here and fill in the details below.
DE78 Other test(s) nameInput the name of other test(s) that were done.
DE79 Other test(s) dateInput the date of other test(s) that were done.
DE80 Other test(s) result(s)Input the result from the test(s).

name: HIV_G
title: HIV.G Diagnostics  CodeSystem
description: CodeSystem for HIV.G Diagnostics  Data Elements
